result.longName: Heavy Engineering Industries and Shipbuilding Company K.S.C.P.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Heavy Engineering Industries and Shipbuilding Company K.S.C.P., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an engineering, procurement, and construction contracting company in Kuwait. The company operates through three segments: Industrial, Oil & Gas; Shipyard; and Offshore. It constructs and repairs ships; marine, industrial, installation, and maintenance work related to ships, waterways, and ports; acts as agent of trading industries; provides repair and public services for transport lines, oil and gas tankers, refineries, factories, and annexes, as well as projects and stations of electrical power generation; supplies, installs, and maintains safety equipment and security systems; undertakes contract works for laying and installation of pipes, sandblasting, paint, and fixed and mobile scaffolds; and acquires movables and real estate. Heavy Engineering Industries and Shipbuilding Company K.S.C.P. was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Abdel Razzaq Abdel Qader  El Othman
companyOfficers.title: Board Sec. & Public Relation Officer
